Blog.post: hay prelims na namin...dami kong nireview sa psych ! nakakaloka!!! buti na lang wala syang kasabay ngayon na test kundi ngarag na naman ang lolah mo! 1:30 pa pasok namin kya may time pa meng mag blog...hay! anong oras na ba ako nakatulog kakareview jan sa psych na yan?! boogie talaga o! sana ma pass ko...pray for me na lang ha!

hay grabe ang tagal kong di nakapagpost ah! eniwei, update ko na lang kayo sa mga pinag gagawa kong kachuvahan (kachuvahan?!)..hehe monday ...ala masayadong kakaiba eh, next... tuesday ...grabe malupit...nung morning asar na asar ako kc ung prof namin sa zoo(wish ko lang di makarating!) ay kakaiba...ang siste,(naks siste!) 7-9 naglecture sya about reproduction chuva basta kung anu ano pa tapos 9-12 ba naman pinasagot samin ung lab manual about cytology ! boogie man o! sana lang tinuro muna nya...another thing, syempre kami di namin alam isasagot namin dun sa ibang questions or should i say karamihan sa ma questions, tong classmate ko may dalang book na hiniram sa higher level. xempre may sagot na un...e di ang siste ulit(siste na naman?! ano pa bang ibang word dun?) kinopya na lang namin ung nasa book..di ba ang laking KALOKOHAN? kaya banas na banas ang lolah mo...well, dun ko naapreciate ang nazareth ...well! pero sabi naman ni mama ganun daw kc talaga sa college..kailangan nag aadvaNce reading ka at tsaka not all the time ay pareparehas ang way of teaching ang mga teachers(kalito ba?) baka daw naninibago lang ang lolah mo kc hindi ganun nung highschool...fyn! pero mali pa rin di ba (ayaw pa rin paawat eh noh?!)hehe...pero cge na nga i'll take na lang my mom's advice...c meckie kc eh no! paro in fairness, parang natunugan ng prof ko kc bago matapos yung class, sinabi nya na sometimes daw hindi na kailangang ituro ng mga teachers ung lesson kasi kailangan din na mageffort ang mga students that we also have to work onour own in order for us to survive (lagot, narinig nya kaya ako?) hehe...fyn cge na mali na ko..huhu...well nung afternoon naman masaya me...kwela kc prof namin sa computer eh...daming kalokohan...alam mo yun di ka mabobore, di ka matatakot, tsaka matututo ka talaga (echos!) hehe...sa p.e. naman, well, favorite ko na ata ang p.e. (meckie ikaw ba yan?!) promise masaya.. f na f ko ..hehe wednesday ...grabe super saya ata me nung araw na to. walwal kc tong si klariz eh...kung anu ano ang nalalaman...well, ichichika ko muna tong si klariz (patay ka sakin)..grabe nung first day ng skul, masyado syang aloof. lam mo yun, la syang sinasamahang friends tapos tatahitahimik..nagmumukmok sa isang tabi..lagi ko yang nilalapitan kc ayoko nung kami nagtatawanan, masaya tapos merong isa na parang outcasted..ayoko nun talaga...so eto ang lolah mo todo effort to talk to this girl na sobrang shy(shy?) tapos pagkaraan lang ng ilang araw gosh masisiraan ka ng bait...malupit pa sakin... certified walwal ...lahat na ata ng classmate kong lalaki kapag nagrerecite eh mahal na nya!tsk tsk klariz talaga o...well!...kei, back to the topic, may pagkalokaloka lang naman me 2ng araw na to...ang saya kc ng nstp at filipino cge na nga pati english! kung anu ano ung pinagsasagot namin at tawanan lang naman kami ng tawanan. di ba may pagkaloka loka?hehe thursday ...in fairness, tinuro na ng lolah mo ung cytology...at next week na ang quiz..hehe..buti naman.. friday ...la naman kaming logic so 1 ang pasok ko...salamat at narecite ko na ung scroll ko (inangkin eh no?!)grabe ang saya-saya..alam mo yun after those sleepless nights,(parang totoo eh no!)hehe joke lang yun.. what i'm trying to say is after all the sacrifices that i've made just to memorize that very inspiring scroll parang ang sarap ng feeling na you've done it very well...grabe 1.25 ako! yahoo!!! everyone here is very proud of me lalo na si ate (yan ha binida kita dito ha!)...hehe. hay, ang saya talaga (ilang beses ko na ba nasabi yun?)..well, after class, nagmamadali akong dumeretso sa nazareth(kala mo tunay eh no?! di ba pumunta ka pa ng sm? *buking!*)..may meeting kc kami..Meeting? meeting for the sat review para sa mga 4th year students..we have to prepare them kc for the entrance exam of the different colleges here pati na rin sa ibang bansa *joke*...tarush no...so nagkita kita na naman kami nina meloh,cecille,karen,tec,cielo,jc,althea at syempre si michaeL (uy!!!) *tinukso ang sarili?* ang saya talaga...sayang nga di nakapunta cna krishna, camille, alex at vern eh...pero grabe saya pa rin noh!...mizz u guys! well, un lang naman...(LANG? HABA NUN AH!)hehe..sana dis week din masaya...hay, kailan kaya ulit kami magkikitakitz ng RT1? miss ko na kc ung moments namin 2geder eh! gosh ha! ano ba kcng sched nyo? nood ulit tau kina vern...nagdemand eh noh?!...promise maganda na ung dadalhin kong vcd...di tulad nung dawn of the dead ala kwentz! cge na hanggang dito na lang...babush! well!!!

I will persist until I succeed. In the orient, young bulls are tested for the fight arena in a certain manner. Each is brought to the ring and allowed to attack a picador who pricks them with a lance. The bravery of each bull is then rated with care according to the number of times he demonstrates his willingness to charge in spite of the sting of the blade. Henceforth will i recognize, that each day, I am tested by life in like manner. If I persist, if I continue to try, if I continue to charge forward, I will succeed. I will persist until I succeed. I was not delivered into this world in defeat, nor does failure course in my veins. I am not a sheep, waiting to be prodded by my shepherd. I am a lion and I refuse to talk, ta walk, to sleep with the sheep. I will hear not those who weep and complain for their disease is contagious. Let them join the sheep. The slaughterhouse of failure is not my destiny. I will persist until I succeed. The prizes of life are at the end of each journey, not near the beginning. It was not given to me to know how many steps are necesarry in order to reach my goal. Failure, I may still encounter the thousandth step. Yet success lies behind the next bend in the road. Never will I know how close it lies until I turn the corner. Always will I take another step. If that is, of no avail, I will take another, yet another. In truth, one step at a time is not too difficult. I will persist until I succeed. Henceforth, I will consider each day's effort as but one blow of my blade against a mighty oak. The first blow may cause not a tremor in the wood, nor the second, nor the third. Each blow, of itself may be triffling, and may seem of no consequence. Yet, from childish swipes the oak will eventually tumble. So, it will be my efforts of today. I will be liken to the raindrop that washes away the mountain, the ant who devours a tiger, the stars which brightens the earth, the slave who builds a pyramid. I will build my castle one brick at a time for i know that small attempts, repeated, will complete any undertakings. I will persist until I succeed. I will never consider defeat and i will remove from my vocabulary such words and phrases like quit, cannot, unable, impossible, out of the question, improbable, failure, unworkable, hopeless and retreat; for they are the words of fools. I will avoid despair but if this disease of the mind should infect me then i will work on in despair. I will toil and i will endure. I will ignore the obstacles at my feet and keep mine eyes on the goals above my head for i know that where dry desert ends, green grass grows. I will persist until I succeed. I will remember the ancient law of averages and i will bend it to my good. I will persist with the knowledge that each failure to sell will increase my chance for success at the next attempt. Each nay I hear will bring me closer to the sound of yea. Each frown I meet only prepares me for the smile to come. Each misfortune I encounter will carry in it the seed of tomorrow's good luck. I must have the night to appreciate the day. I must fail often to succeed only once. I will persist until I succeed. I will try, and try, andtry again. Each obstacles I will consider as a mere detour to my goal and challenge to my profession. I will persist and develop my skills as the mariner develops his, by learning to ride out the wrath of each storm. I will persist until I succeed. Henceforth, I will learn and apply another secret of those who excel in my work. when each day is ended, not regarding whether it has been a success or a failure, I will attempt to achieve one more sale. When my thoughts beckon my tired body homeward I will resist the temptation to depart. I will try again. I will make one more attempt to close with victory, and if that fails, i will make another. Never will I allow any day to end with a failure. Thus, I will plant the seed of tomorrow's success and gain an insurmountable advantage over those who cease their labor at a prescribed time. When others cease their struggle, then mine will begin, and my harvest will be full. I will persist until I succeed. Nor will I allow yesterday's success to lull me into today's complacency, for this is the great foundation of failure. I will forget the happenings of the day that is gone, whether they were good or bad, and greet the new sun with confidence that this will be the best day of my life. So long as there is breath in me, that long will i persist. For now, i know, one of the greatest principles of success; if i persist long enough i will win. I will persist. I will win. *ang tarush noh?! well, that's my scroll. i'm going to recite that on friday. it's long but okay naman di ba? ang ganda ng message. matarush! hehe..chige gotta go..boogie kc c meloh (melandro) may pinaparesearch...hmp! babush!!!

hay grabe na to! unahan daw ba ako ni ate..boogie talaga oh!!so blogger na rin me..actually lam ko na to atagal na..lagi nga me nagbabasa ng mga posts sa ibat ibang bloggers eh kaso ngaun lang me talaga nagka tym(tarush ha TIME)..so un lang pow muna. corny noH? hehe...

it's been a tireless day...we had a discussion in zoology this morning about cytology which we didn't finish and will be continued on thursday (meaning there's no exam on that day...hay salamat!). after the discussion, we were given the skeleton of the frog and the frog itself. a scene flashed in my mind upon receiving it...i remembered our biology days...when we were in second year, our beloved teacher ( Mr. Serafin "Raffy" Molina ) introduced us to our frog prince... for us not to be afraid of it or find it gross before dissecting it, he let us stand in a circle and pass the frog to one another without any gloves...it was just fine for me..i'm not afraid of it and i don't find it gross...maybe it's just the smell of the formalin that make it gross...anyway, if there's somebody that i would always remember everytime that i would see, or dissect frogs it would be ALTHEA ...gosh! she's so afraid of it! she even vomited (if im not mistaken) when she received the frog in the jar (nasa jar pa lang yun ha!) hehe..anyway, miss you dhang! okay, enough of that funny memory...i thought we're going to dissect na the frogs eh di ko pa dala yung dissecting set ko courtesy of Ms. Klariz " KAGANDAHAN " delos Santos ..buti na lang yung skeleton muna ang ginamit namin. bale pinaghiwahiwalay namin yung mga parts nun then on thursday, we're going to form it, put it on an illustration board and label it..it will be graded of course...den after that, todo hugas talaga kami ng kamay with matching hand sanitizer ha! hindi sa nagiinarte noh, xempre iba na rin yung maingat...sa panahon ngayon, bawal ang magkasakit *commercial?!* hehe... after having lunch we went up na to the 6th floor through the use of the elevator...xempre inokray na naman namin yung guy na nag ooperate ng elevator...c kuya michael *close?!* lagi namin kasi yun kinukulit tuwing sasakay kami ng elevator at nakukulitan talaga sya samin with matching sabi ba naman na "ganyan talaga ang mga PT students eh" *nagtaray?!* hehe... la pang 1 nang umakyat kami *excited* (1:30 pa sched namin) so baba na naman kami at kinulit si kuya...kumain muna kami ng squid balls sa canteen den go na...tapos la rin, we waited for an hour tapos absent naman pala si sir tabuena...talaga naman oh! tsk tsk...di tuloy me nakapag internet...meloh and i planned pa naman of something... as in lahat nakaplano na ha...tapos la rin pala...buti na lang may internet card pa kami dito sa bahay...hmp! after realizing na 1 hour na kaming naghihintay for our prof, we decided na to go for our next class...ang aking favorite(?)...P.E....hehe..sasakit na naman katawan namin dito...and true enough..kasi kala ko makakapahinga na kami kasi for sure tuturuan ng prof namin yung mga umabsent. yun pala kami din ang magtuturo...pero kei lang masarap naman yung feeling na nakakatulong di ba? (ashoos! echos!) *joke*

i just had a conversation with michael(cruz) yesterday and i found out that VERN was again rushed to the hospital last thursday...she had a fever again kasi...cmon guys if you cannot visit her on the hospital, just text her and let her feel your presence or better yet let's all pray for her immediate recovery...this is the time she needs our support so please lang...

grabe ang sakit ng katawan ko! at for sure dahil yun sa abdominal exercises na pinagawa samin nung p.e. well, kahapon di ko pa masyadong feel yung pain pero pag gising ko kanina, my god grabe ang sakit lalo na yung likod ko. ewan ko ba, sa pagkakaalam ko abdominal exercises yun pero halos lahat kami kundi sumakit ang likod eh yung legs naman!...tapos pressured pa kaming ma perfect yun kasi kailangan sa tuesday daw magserve kami as models para dun sa mga umabsent kasi halos mabibilang mo lang talaga kami siguro la pa kami sa 20...kasi yung mga broad comm students na kaklase namin lagi na lang nag-uusap usap na wag pasukan yung p.e. kaya tuloy nahuhuli kami sa ibang tinuturuan ng teacher namin...pero in fairness may additional grade naman kami noh! hehe... maiba naman...kanina may logic kami...grabe favorite ko na talaga yung subject na yun! nakaka challenge. tapos kei pa yung prof namin hindi boring at masayang magturo. tapos la kaming math. di pumasok prof namin for a reason i don't know. den binigay na yung ticket for our acquaintance party ...nagdadalawang isip ako kung pupunta ako. kasi unang una, it will be held on a place na ngayon ko lang narinig...sa discontrol daw basta it's somewhere in tomas morato daw...den for sure magulo dun, everyone will be smoking and drinking alcoholic beverages. eh ayoko ng mga ganun noh?! no offense meant dun sa mga taong involve dun ha...tapos di pa me pala party(ows?! magpakatotoo ka nga!hehe joke!) hindi, totoo yun, di ba di naman me talaga pala party...gusto ko sana talagang pumunta kc for sure masaya yun...meron pang gay pageant tapos tutugtog pa yung mga classmates ko kaso kasi kung titimbangin mo, mas marami yung negative ko kesa sa positive di ba? tsaka isa pa, as if naman pinapayagan me noh? maski sabihin mo pang may sasakyan kami noh! ah basta siguro di na lang me talaga pupunta...kasi for sure lantang gulay na naman ako sa gabing yun kasi we will do a corporal work of mercy nga pala(bury the dead) sa afternoon. tapos nilagay ko na sa sched ko yung mga gagawin kong tasks in school...hay talaga nga naman! "KUNG GUSTO MO, MARAMING PARAAN...KUNG AYAW MO, MARAMING DAHILAN" ...hehe... o chige hanggang dito na lang...babush!!!

hay la me magawa!!! ive been very busy these past weeks kaya i wasnt able to blog. buti na nga lang at tapos na me sa pinapagawa ni sir tabuena (computer teacher namin) kaya eto me ngayon nagpapakasawa sa internet..hehe..well,upto now nga busy pa rin me eh...daming inaasikaso...yung sa buwan ng wika, yung sa nstp, tapos halos every meeting may practical and theoretical exam kami sa zoo...boogie talaga o! pero in fairness mali naman pala yung impression ko sa zoo prof namin... ako lang siguro talaga ang may mali ...dapat mag effort na talaga me kasi ang bababa ng mga tests ko d2...prelims have passed and hindi gaanong okay yung scores ko..huhu..pero kei lang i'll try to be better next time. i will live na the scroll that i had recited ...hehe...kinareer talaga yung scroll eh noh?! well, may bad news pala. Vernice is sick . nagka typhoid fever sya and shes in the hospital upto now...i visited her last saturday together with ms. baylon, cecile and krishna ...when we got there it so happened that tectec and rafael was there too...then after few minutes lui came together with kevin and paul ...grabe ginulo namin si vernice dun. actually ang balak nga namin sana eh buong rt1 will visit her kaso ewan ko dun sa mga bruhong yun at hindi na nakapunta...ichecheer pa naman namin sana si vern..hehe..well pagaling ka na lang friend ha and see you when i see you!
